history.proof: intros H1 H2. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_mm_sss_dec_1. pose proof mm_sss_fun as Hfun. apply Hfun with (t2 := (1 + i, v[u/x])) in H2. -- qsimpl time: 1 use: in_mm_sss_dec_1. -- apply in_mm_sss_dec_1; auto. -- sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: apply in_mm_sss_dec_1 in H2 as [Hj Hw].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])" on hypothesis of type "DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w)".

ctx: apply Hfun with (t2 := (1 + i, v[u/x])) in H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (S i, v[u/x]) n : nat x : pos n k, u, i : nat v : vec nat n j : nat w : vec nat n H1 : v#>x = S u H2 : (j, w) = (1 + i, v[u/x]) Hfun : forall (i : mm_instr (pos n)) (s t1 t2 : mm_state n), i // s -1> t1 -> i // s -1> t2 -> t1 = t2 Unable to unify "S i" with "j".

original: intros H1 H2. apply in_mm_sss_dec_1 in H2 as [Hj Hw]. pose proof mm_sss_fun as Hfun. apply Hfun with (t2 := (1 + i, v[u/x])) in H2. -- split; auto. -- apply in_mm_sss_dec_1; auto.
